Item.Chart: Row1: *P4, K1, P1, K4* rep** to end Row2: *P3, K2, P2, K3* rep** to end Row3: *P2, K2, P1, K1, P2, K2* rep** to end Row4: *P1, K2, P2, K2, P2, K1* rep** to end Row5: *K2, P3, K3, P2* rep** to end Row6: *K1, P4, K4, P1* rep** to end Repeat these 6 rows for pattern

Item.Description: Super cute especially with thinner thread and smaller needles
Item.Chart: Row1: Knit Row2: K5 *P3, K5* rep** to end Row3: P5 *K3, P5* rep** to end Row4: K5 *P3, K5* rep** to end Row5: Knit Row6: K1 *P3, K5* rep** to last 4 stitches, P3, K1 Row7: P1 *K3, P5* rep** to last 4 stitches, K3, P1 Row8: K1 *P3, K5* rep** to last 4 stitches, P3, K1 Repeat these 8 rows for pattern
Row1: K2 P6 K2 Row2: P2 K6 P2 Row3: K2 P6 K2 Row4: P2 C6 P2 Row5: K2 P6 K2 Row6: P2 K6 P2 Repeat these 6 rows for pattern
Item.Notes: Need cable needle or extra dp needle C6 = slip next 3 stitches on cable needle and hold to front or back. Knit the next three stitches from left needle then knit the stitches on cable needle. Cable will twist to the right if held to the front and to the left if held to the back.

Item.Chart: Row1: K3 *P3, K3* rep** to end Row2: P3 *K3, P3* rep** to end Row3: K3 *P3, K3* rep** to end Row4: K1 *P3, K3* rep** to last 2 stitches, P2 Row5: K2 *P3, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Row6: K1 *P3, K3* rep** to last 2 stitches, P2 Row7: K1 *P3, K3* rep** to last 2 stitches, P2 Row8: K2 *P3, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Row9: K1 *P3, K3* rep** to last 2 stitches, P2 Row10: K3 *P3, K3* rep** to end Row11: P3 *K3, P3* rep** to end Row12: K3 *P3, K3* rep** to end Row13: P2 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row14: P1 *K3, P3* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row15: P2 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row16: P2 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row17: P1 *K3, P3* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row18: P2 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Repeat these 18 rows for pattern

Row1: K1 *P1, K9, P1, K1* rep** to end Row2: K1 *P1, K1, P7, K1, P1, K1* rep** to end Row3: K1 *P1, K1, P1, K5, P1, K1, P1, K1* rep ** to end Row4: P1 *P1, K1, P1, K1, P3, K1, P1, K1, P2* rep ** to end Row5: K1 *K2, P1, K1, P1, K1, P1, K1, P1, K3* rep** to end Row6: P1 *P3, K1, P1, K1, P1, K1, P4* rep** to end Row7: K1 *K4, P1, K1, P1, K5* rep** to end Row8: P1 *P3, K1, P1, K1, P1, K1, P4* rep** to end Row9: K1 *K2, P1, K1, P1, K1, P1, K1, P1, K3* rep** to end Row10: P1 *P1, K1, P1, K1, P3, K1, P1, K1, P2* rep ** to end Row11: K1 *P1, K1, P1, K5, P1, K1, P1, K1* rep ** to end Row12: K1 *P1, K1, P7, K1, P1, K1* rep** to end Repeat these 12 rows for pattern
Row1: Knit Row2: Purl Row3: K1 *P2, K1* rep** to end Row4: Purl Repeat these 4 rows for pattern
Row1: *K2 P2* rep** to end Row2: *P2 K2* rep** to end Repeat

Row1: Knit Row2: Purl Row3: K1 *k2tog, yo, K2* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row4: Purl Row5: Knit Row6: Purl Row7: K1 *K2, ssk, yo* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row8: Purl Repeat these 8 rows for pattern
Item.Notes: k2tog = knit 2 together (through front of next two stiches at once) yo = yarn over (wrap the yarn from back to front counterclockwise) ssk = slip slip knit, slip next two stitches onto the right needle (one at a time) as if to knit, insert left needle into fronts of both stitches and knit them together

Item.Chart: Row1: K1, P3 *sl3 purlwise with yarn at front, P3* rep ** to last stitch, K1 Row2: P1, K3 *sl3 purlwise with yarn at back, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Row3: K1, P3 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row4: P1, K3 *P3, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Row5: K5 *pull up loops (see note), K5* rep** to end Row6: K1, P3 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row7: P1 *sl3 purlwise with yarn at front, P3* rep** to last 4 stitches, sl3 purlwise, P1 Row8: K1 *sl3 purlwise with yarn at back, K3* rep** to last 4 stitches, sl3 purlwise, K1 Row9: P1, K3 *P3, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Row10: K1, P3 *K3, P3* rep** to last stitch, K1 Row11: K2 *pull up loops, K5* rep** to last 3 stitches, pull up loops, K2 Row12: P1, K3 *P3, K3* rep** to last stitch, P1 Repeat these 12 rows for pattern
Item.Notes: Pull up loops: note the loops created by the slipped stitches below the stitch you are about to work. Insert right needle upwards through both loops and knit the next stitch, pulling the stitch through the 2 loops, letting them off the needles and keeping the knitted stitch on the left needle.

Item.Chart: Row1: K3 *P3 K3* rep** to end Row2: P3 *K3, yo, P3* rep** to end Row3: K3 *P4, K3* rep** to end Row4: P3 *K1, K2tog, yo, K1, P3* rep** to end Row5: K3 *P2, p2tog, K3* rep** to end Row6: P3 *K1, yo, k2tog, P3* rep** to end Repeat these 6 rows
Item.Notes: yo = yarn over (wrap the yarn from back to front counterclockwise) k2tog = knit 2 together (through front of next two stiches at once) p2tog = purl 2 together (through front of next 2 stitches at once)

Item.Chart: Row1: *K2, P1* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row2: K3 *P2, K1* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row3: *K2, P1* rep** to last 2 stitches, K2 Row4: Knit Repeat these 4 rows for pattern
Row1: Knit Row2: *K1, P1* rep** to last stitch, K1 Repeat these 2 rows for pattern
